1.2.name: wordpress/weekly-time-table
1.2.description:
Basically, this systems installs 2 tables in the db: - the entry table - the time table

Whenever you create an entry you can associate it with a time table. Each cell is free to fill with whatever you want. No formatting is done. Then you can use a shortcode with the entry id as a parameter.

The plugin has been translated in spanish and french so far.

For more information check the plugin homepage: http://www.fifteenpeas.com/blog/wordpress-weekly-time-table-plugin/
